Html:
There is a lot of trace files in my log folder on one day (800 mb in 3 hours)! How to stop logging or tracing? And only log exceptions?
Help me please.
Check the web.config... you can turn off the trace from there.
I have reordered the DecoratedRepository for minimal logging. Also as antoniochagoury mentioned that it depends upon Enterprise Library logging which you can tweak according to your need.
